name: Love Beyond Stars - Alien "Dating" Simulator (DEMO) !
description:
Out one night for a stroll, radiant light of a passing "comet" will lead you to discover an out-of-this-world encounter with.. Possibly a new partner?

-

Welcome to Love Beyond Stars!! A personal passion project of mine to spend a bit of summer on-- Only a demo at the moment, with 2 chapters, but hopefully an enjoyable little experience!! <:] 

This isn't necessarily a dating simulator, as there are additional options planned to go for different endings, but romance is the base idea!! There's multiple mini endings, feel free to play around!!

Love Beyond Stars offers features of:

  • One primary alien you'll get to know soon enough. Loyal to their empire of origin, they tend to be direct with conversation-- But, that isn't to say they don't have feelings to speak of.. 
  • Custom artwork and assets, all entirely done by me!!
  • Stock music that you swear could be stock music, but it sounds too obscure to be stock music, so does that mean I could be lying? Absolutely, but I'm not. Or am I?
  • Love :]

The game controls as if any other Ren'Py engine-based game, but there is a controls menu if required!! You just gotta click things mainly <:]

CREDITS:

  • Made with Ren'Py 7.4.6.1693.
  • Music Credits; (Music in order of when you hear it)
    Space Theme - Chan Walrus , Space Xplorers - Kevin MacLeod , Space 1990 - Kevin MacLeod , Ebb Of The Stars - Chan Walrus
